short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to push notifications from Integromat directly to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integromat will automate processes that you currently handle manually. It is not only capable of connecting apps but can also transfer and transform data. It works 24 hours a day, seven days a week and does not require your intervention. Simply set Integromat to do what you want and let it work for you. Save your time!
